short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 为用户提供快捷的账号管理

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool is designed to assist users in managing their self-media accounts. The webpage, accessible via the plug-in, enables users to view the exposure status of their published content across different self-media platforms, and provides visual icons to aid in the analysis of optimizing self-media operations. Installation can be done through the app store or manually. Please note, the full functionality of the webpage is contingent upon the successful installation of the plug-in; failure to install may result in restricted access to certain features.

Additionally, please be aware that using our product requires logging in. Currently, we only support login via WeChat.
